screenshot.caption: ABR file open in Adobe Photoshop 2022

description: Photoshop's Brush tool allows you to paint brush strokes with a variety of sizes, textures, and other effects. After creating a brush or brushes in Photoshop, you can export those brushes as a single ABR file. This allows you to share the brushes with other Photoshop users.
By default, Photoshop stores brushes in the following directory:
To export one or more Photoshop brushes as an ABR file:
